schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

step_run.description: Reference to analysis step run in pipeline
step_run.title: Analysis step run

___href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

quality_metric_of.description: One or more files that this metric either applies to or is calculated from.
quality_metric_of.title: Files

items.description: A particular file associated with this quality metric.
items.comment: See file.json for a list of available identifiers.
items.title: File

description: Schema for reporting ChIP library complexity and cross-correlation quality metrics
title: ChIP-seq library complexity and cross-correlation quality metric

___RSC.description: Relative cross correlation coefficient. Ratio of strand cross-correlation at fragment length  and at read length
___RSC.title: Relative cross correlation coefficient

___NRF.description: Non redundant fraction (indicates library complexity).  Number of distinct unique mapping reads (i.e. after removing duplicates) / Total number of reads
___NRF.title: Non-redundant fraction

___PBC1.description: PCR Bottlenecking coefficient 1 = M1/M_DISTINCT where M1: number of genomic locations where exactly one read maps uniquely, M_DISTINCT: number of distinct genomic locations to which some read maps uniquely
___PBC1.title: PCR bottlenecking coefficient 1

___href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

___fragment length.description: Fragment length/strandshift. This is the estimated fragment length/strand shift for each dataset as estimated by strand cross-correlation analysis
___fragment length.title: Fragment length

___NSC.description: Normalized strand cross-correlation = FRAGLEN_CC / MIN_CC. Ratio of strand cross-correlation at estimated fragment length to the minimum cross-correlation over all shifts.
___NSC.title: Normalized strand cross-correlation

___PBC2.description: PCR Bottlenecking coefficient 2 (indicates library complexity) = M1/M2 where M1: number of genomic locations where only one read maps uniquely and M2: number of genomic locations where 2 reads map uniquely
___PBC2.title: PCR bottlenecking coefficient 2
